items.sentence: Tom told me he thought that Mary would be present at today's meeting.
The Greeks landed on the Italian peninsula in the eighth century B.C.
Tom asked me how I kept from getting nervous in front of an audience.
Tom wanted to stay single, but his parents wanted him to get married.
We lay in the grass holding hands and watched the clouds floating by.
Tom said that he had some things that he needed to get off his chest.
The pirates lost their patience with Tom and made him walk the plank.
Tell me one reason why I should trust Tom after what he's done to me.
We waited half an hour at the library for Tom, but he didn't turn up.
If you don't get out of my store, I'm going to have to call the cops.
